== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
variable1:
  description: a first variable
  type: choice
  multi: true
  choices:
    - val1
    - val2
variable2:
  description: a second variable
  type: choice
  multi: true
  mandatory: false
  choices:
    - val1
    - val2
----
